title: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Huta-Studenetska, Bleshnya, Liskivschyna, Karpovychi of C...
content: At sivershchyna and slBozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled huta-studnetska, Bleshhnya, Liskivschyna, Karpovychi of Chernihiv Region, BOPARO, BOPILIA, BOPILYAPILYA. Sillya, Myropillya, Popivka, Dmytrivka of Sumy Region, Kozacha Lopan, Vovchansk, Krasne, Neskuchne of Kharkiv Region. Russian Aviation Conducted Airstrikes at Semenivka of Chernihiv Region, Neskuchne, Oleksandrivka, Druzhba of Sumy Region, Odradne, Kolodyazne of Khark. raine Says in the Evening Report
